thread.title: An excellent choice for Beijing stay!
thread.title_full: An excellent choice for Beijing stay! - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: alicewi323
title: An excellent choice for Beijing stay!
text:
這酒店非常方便，位置一流。房間清潔舒適!在酒店大堂的noodle bar價錢平理，味道很好。酒店的早餐只要70元，也不貴。。
可能是因為wifi有收費計劃，免費wifi是蠻弱的。
Its my first stay here and found this place an excellent and cosy place to stay. It is just around the corner of subway and the landmark New World Dept store is just next to it. There are numerous 24 hours restaurants around and the noodle bar of the hotel tastes great! The output is so value for money.
I am staying at 15th floor where have nice view and cosy setting.
The location is close to the famous historic spots and you can take subway there within 30 mins.
I will highly recommend this hotel to my friends for both leisure and business.
